snippet: Emily Johnson’s dance installation “Niicugni,” at the Baryshnikov Arts Center, is a detailed exploration of her Yupik heritage.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews New York premiere of Emily Johnson dance installation Niicugni at the Baryshnikov Arts Center as part of Performance Space 122's Coil Festival.
lead_paragraph: Emily Johnson’s dance installation “Niicugni,” at the Baryshnikov Arts Center, is a detailed exploration of her Yupik heritage.

headline.seo: Emily Johnson’s ‘Niicugni,’ at Baryshnikov Arts Center
headline.main: Moving Back in Time and Nearer to Nature
headline.print_headline: Moving Back in Time and Nearer to Nature
